static PatchDataRestartManager * getManager ()

Detailed Description

Class PatchDataRestartManager handles registration of PatchData for restart.

Member Function Documentation

PatchDataRestartManager * SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataRestartManager::getManager (  )  [static]

Return a pointer to the single instance of the PatchDataRestartManager. All access to the PatchDataRestartManager object is through getManager().

Note that when the manager is accessed for the first time, the Singleton instance is registered with the StartupShutdownManager class which destroys such objects at program completion. Thus, users of this class do not explicitly allocate or deallocate the Singleton instance.

Referenced by SAMRAI::hier::Patch::getFromRestart(), SAMRAI::hier::Patch::putToRestart(), and SAMRAI::algs::MethodOfLinesIntegrator::registerVariable().

bool SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataRestartManager::isPatchDataRegisteredForRestart ( int  index  )  const [inline]

Check whether given patch data index is registered with the manager for restart.

Parameters:
[in] index Integer patch data index to check.
Returns:
Boolean true if the patch data with the given index is registered for restart; otherwise false.
